Welcome to PrimeSofa and Furnishings

Your premier destination for exquisite, comfortable furniture. Our curated collection boasts handcrafted sofas, chairs, tables, and accessories meticulously designed to elevate the aesthetics and functionality of your living space.

At PrimeSofa and Furnishings, we take pride in our commitment to utilizing only the finest quality materials and expert craftsmanship to fashion pieces that are as durable as they are elegant. Whether you're envisioning a timeless leather sofa or a contemporary sectional, our extensive range caters to diverse tastes and preferences.

{/* //our services */}
{/* Display "Welcome to Haven Sofa" only on smaller devices */}

Welcome to Haven Sofa

{/* Display the full content on larger devices */}

Our Story

Primesofa and Furnishings crafts sustainable, eco-friendly furniture. Skilled craftsmen create high-quality pieces using eco-conscious materials.

Based in Bengaluru, we deliver unique, sustainable furniture across India. Experience comfort, style, and sustainability with us.
